He competes in category long distance events. ==Marathon== In 2011, he won the wheelchair division of the New York City Marathon. He completed the course in 1 hour 31 minutes 41 seconds (1:31:41). He dedicated his race to the children in Japan, who were affected by the 2011 T≈çhoku earthquake and tsunami and the Fukushima nuclear disaster.Otis, John. Soejima won the wheelchair division of the Boston Marathon in 2011. ==Paralympics== Masazumi has competed in the marathon in both the 2004 and 2008 Summer Paralympics, 10000m in 2004, 5000m and 1500m in 2008. In the 4x400m relay in 2004, he won a bronze medal.
